Detailed Description

Implements various flags. Uses object oriented style inspired by that of Views 2.

Function Documentation

flag_create_handler ( $  content_type  ) 

Instantiates a new flag handler. A flag handler is more commonly know as "a flag". A factory method usually populates this empty flag with settings loaded from the database.

flag_fetch_definition ( $  content_type = NULL  ) 

Returns a flag definition.

flag_flag_definitions (  ) 

Implementation of hook_flag_definitions().

Defines the flags this module implements.

Returns:
An "array of arrays", keyed by content-types. The 'handler' slot should point to the PHP class implementing this flag.

flag_get_types (  ) 

Returns all flag types defined on the system.
